title: SpaceX confirms next Starship launch target – Here’s when it will take off
summary:
SpaceX has confirmed a new target date for the seventh Starship test launch after weather in Texas delayed the first scheduled date for “three or four days.” The company is now targeting the launch for Monday, January 13, at 4 p.m. CST or 5 p.m. EST. The launch date is not set in stone as […]
The post SpaceX confirms next Starship launch target – Here’s when it will take off appeared first on TESLARATI.
